summary: This is a sweetfx preset like I can't  Believe It's not ENB. I made it, liked it and wanted to share it.
descriptionHtml:
[b][u][i]New "subtle" version available.[/i][/u]

[size=4]IF YOU LIKE THIS PLEASE ENDORSE.

[size=3]also check out the sister mods:[/size][/size]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/newvegas/mods/57450/?]New Vegas
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/fallout3/mods/20799/?]Fallout 3
[/url]

GENERAL DESCRIPTION:[/b]

[u][i]This is an alternative to ENB. This will effect your FPS, just not as much as ENB.

[/i][/u]This preset makes shadows darker, colors more vibrant, and slightly tweaks lighting. This is why it is most noticable at night or in interiors.

I, like many others here, spend more time modding the game than playing it. Mostly I spend the
majority of my time trying to make the game as pretty as possible while
also being playable. This preset, when combined with other notable mods,
should provide plenty of quality to the game's visuals. I managed to
run this with Hi res textures at a steady 30 fps on my
laptop. Obviously this won't compensate for the detailed shadows and
ambient occlusion of ENB, but that's the price you pay for performance
(considering those two and DOF are the most expensive processes of ENB).


My specs:

AMD A8-5550M APU with Radeon(tm) HD graphics 2.10 GHz
AMD Radeon HD 8550G
4GB RAM
Running Windows 8.1

[b]INSTALLATION:

[/b]You will need SweetFX already installed in some compacity.
If you don't have an ENB or SweetFX already installed go here:
http://www.guru3d.com/files-get/sweetfx-shader-suite-download,1.html
Move the files into you root directory.
Simply replace the SweetFX_Settings file.

It is also recommended that you use ENB for its speed and stability functions. Simply uncheck "Use effect".
Using both should look like this in your enblocal.ini

[PROXY]
EnableProxyLibrary=true
InitProxyFunctions=true
ProxyLibrary=d3d9_sweetfx.dllÂ  (or whatever your sweetfx .dll is called.)


[b]DISCLAIMER:
[/b]
Results may vary.
Please be kind in your comments and I'll do my best to accomodate any requests.
author: onowrouzi
